EmailTemplate.name: ES-2018-12-17 Trial Promo 2 - MQLs.ES-2018-12-18 Trial Promo 2 - MQLs
EmailTemplate.subject: Assure Application Performance through Automation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
The challenges of today require more than traditional scripting and orchestration. They need an AI-powered infrastructure which enables decision automation. Check out Turbonomic CEO, Benjamin Nye <[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/videos/thecube-ai-ops]]>, discussing AI-Powered workload management on theCUBE.
<[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/videos/thecube-ai-ops]]> <[[https://turbonomic.com/press-releases/hiscox-cio-joins-turbonomic-board-of-directors/]]>
We are proud to be leading the charge towards AI Ops at Turbonomic. With our AI-powered platform, customers empower the IT organization to embrace trustworthy, full-stack automation, and get back to the business of innovation.
Don't take our word for it. Explore Turbonomic for yourself. Download a 30-day free trial of Turbonomic today! <[[https://turbonomic.com/downloads/turbonomic-30-day-trial/?utm_campaign=70157000001j4nFAAQ]]>
Best, Andrew
